Package business.interfaces

Interface IDepartmentSummary

All Known Implementing Classes:
DepartmentSummary
public interface IDepartmentSummary
Defines the interface for generating and accessing department summary information. This interface provides functionality for:
  • Generating basic and detailed department summaries
  • Displaying department information
  • Accessing department statistics and identifiers

Implementing classes should provide both concise and comprehensive views of department information, suitable for different reporting needs.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String getBasicSummary()
    Generates a basic summary of the department's information.
    DepartmentId getDepartmentId()
    Retrieves the unique identifier for the department.
    java.lang.String getDetailedInfo()
    Generates detailed information about the department.
    int getStaffCount()
    Retrieves the total number of staff members in the department.
    int getStudentCount()
    Retrieves the total number of students in the department.
    void printDetailedInfo()
    Prints detailed department information to the standard output.
    void printSummary()
    Prints the basic department summary to the standard output.

  • Method Details

    • getBasicSummary

      java.lang.String getBasicSummary()
      Generates a basic summary of the department's information. This typically includes the department name and key statistics.
      Returns:
      A formatted string containing the basic department summary

    • getDetailedInfo

      java.lang.String getDetailedInfo()
      Generates detailed information about the department. This includes comprehensive information about students, staff, courses, and other relevant department details.
      Returns:
      A formatted string containing detailed department information

    • printSummary

      void printSummary()
      Prints the basic department summary to the standard output. This method should format and display the basic summary in a user-friendly manner.

    • printDetailedInfo

      void printDetailedInfo()
      Prints detailed department information to the standard output. This method should format and display comprehensive department information in a structured and readable format.

    • getDepartmentId

      DepartmentId getDepartmentId()
      Retrieves the unique identifier for the department.
      Returns:
      The department's unique identifier

    • getStudentCount

      int getStudentCount()
      Retrieves the total number of students in the department.
      Returns:
      The count of students enrolled in the department

    • getStaffCount

      int getStaffCount()
      Retrieves the total number of staff members in the department.
      Returns:
      The count of staff members working in the department
